mapper.insert: insert into organization (ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgSubtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{villageFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salesorgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divorgFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId4a,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgContractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgAreaLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update organization set PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_TYPE = #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_SUBTYPE = #{orgSubtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VILLAGE_FLAG = #{villageFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ORG_ID = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_LEVEL = #{orgLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_INDEX = #{orgIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SALESORG_CODE = #{salesorgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIVORG_FLAG = #{divorgFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_DIVISION = #{orgDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id_4a = #{orgId4a,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE = #{orgContractType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_AREA_LEVEL = #{orgAreaLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DESC = #{orgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC, ORG_NAME_C3, ORG_NAME_C4, ORG_NAME_C5 from organization where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization

select org.ORG_ID, org.PARTY_ID, org.ORG_CODE, org.ORG_NAME, org.REGION_ID, org.ORG_TYPE, org.ORG_SUBTYPE, org.VILLAGE_FLAG, org.PARENT_ORG_ID, org.ORG_LEVEL, org.ORG_INDEX, org.SALESORG_CODE, org.DIVORG_FLAG, org.CREATE_DATE, org.CREATE_STAFF, org.STATUS_CD, org.STATUS_DATE, org.UPDATE_DATE, org.UPDATE_STAFF, org.ORG_DIVISION, org.org_id_4a, org.ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, org.ORG_AREA_LEVEL, org.REMARK, org.ORG_DESC from organization org left join org_rel orel on orel.Z_ORG_ID = org.ORG_ID where orel.STATUS_CD = 1000 and org.ORG_DIVISION in (20,30) and org.STATUS_CD = 1000 and orel.ORG_REL_TYPE = 1900 and orel.A_ORG_ID = #{parentId}

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization where ORG_DIVISION in (20,30) and STATUS_CD = 1000 and ORG_LEVEL = 2

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization where ORG_ID = #{areaId}

select ORG_ID from organization where 1=1
and ORG_ID in
#{item}
and ORG_LEVEL > 3

select b.org_id orgId, b.org_name orgName from org_rel a ,organization b where a.status_cd=1000 and a.org_rel_type=1900 and a.z_org_id=b.org_id and b.org_division in (20,30)
and a.A_ORG_ID in
#{item}
and ORG_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{orgName},'%'))

SELECT b.STAFF_ORG_REL_ID, b.REL_TYPE, a.ORG_ID, a.ORG_CODE, a.ORG_NAME, b.STATUS_CD, a.ORG_DIVISION, a.ORG_NAME_C3, a.ORG_NAME_C4, a.ORG_NAME_C5 FROM organization a, staff_org_rel b WHERE a.ORG_ID = b.ORG_ID AND b.rel_type = 1900 AND b.STAFF_ID = #{staffId};

select org.ORG_ID, org.PARTY_ID, org.ORG_CODE, org.ORG_NAME, org.REGION_ID, org.ORG_TYPE, org.ORG_SUBTYPE, org.VILLAGE_FLAG, org.PARENT_ORG_ID, org.ORG_LEVEL, org.ORG_INDEX, org.SALESORG_CODE, org.DIVORG_FLAG, org.CREATE_DATE, org.CREATE_STAFF, org.STATUS_CD, org.STATUS_DATE, org.UPDATE_DATE, org.UPDATE_STAFF, org.ORG_DIVISION, org.org_id_4a, org.ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, org.ORG_AREA_LEVEL, org.REMARK, org.ORG_DESC from organization org left join org_rel orel on orel.Z_ORG_ID = org.ORG_ID where orel.STATUS_CD = 1000 and org.ORG_DIVISION in (20,30) and org.STATUS_CD = 1000 and orel.ORG_REL_TYPE = 1900 and 6 > org.ORG_LEVEL and orel.A_ORG_ID = #{parentId}

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization where ORG_DIVISION in (20,30) and STATUS_CD = 1000 and 6 > ORG_LEVEL

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC, ORG_NAME_C3, ORG_NAME_C4, ORG_NAME_C5 from organization where ORG_NAME_C4 = #{orgNameC4}

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC, ORG_NAME_C3, ORG_NAME_C4, ORG_NAME_C5 from organization where ORG_NAME_C5 = #{orgNameC5}

select ORG_ID, PARTY_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_TYPE, ORG_SUBTYPE, VILLAGE_FLAG, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEVEL, ORG_INDEX, SALESORG_CODE, DIVORG_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, ORG_DIVISION, org_id_4a, ORG_CONTRACT_TYPE, ORG_AREA_LEVEL, REMARK, ORG_DESC from organization WHERE ORG_ID IN ("800000000021","800000000022","800000000023","800000000024","800000000025","800000000026","800000000037","800000000038","800000000039","800000000040","800000000041")
